# Kubernetes Manifests

Generated by compose2k8s

## Generated Files

- `mosquitto-deployment.yaml` — Deployment for mosquitto
- `mosquitto-data-pvc.yaml` — PersistentVolumeClaim for mosquitto: /mosquitto/data
- `mosquitto-service.yaml` — Service for mosquitto
- `mosquitto-configmap-mosquitto-mosquitto-conf.yaml` — ConfigMap for mosquitto file: mosquitto.conf

## Apply

```sh
kubectl create namespace mqtt --dry-run=client -o yaml | kubectl apply -f -
kubectl apply -f examples/01-tcp-service/k8s/ -n mqtt
```

## Storage

Ensure your cluster has a default StorageClass or specify one in the PVC/StatefulSet manifests.
